llm-registry.name: Claude Opus 4.6
llm-registry.description: Careful, thorough, strong at synthesis and philosophical depth. Good when the entry needs sustained reasoning or when corpus material is complex. Willing to sit with ambiguity.

llm-registry.name: Claude Sonnet 4.6
llm-registry.description: Fast, precise, good at execution. Appropriate for straightforward entries or when the user is in working mode. Concise without being shallow.

llm-registry.name: GPT-5.2
llm-registry.description: Different training distribution from Claude. Useful for getting a perspective that won't echo Claude's tendencies. Good for lateral connections and unexpected framings.

llm-registry.name: Gemini 3.1 Pro Preview
llm-registry.description: Google's model. Different reasoning patterns and training data. Strong at structured analysis. Good third voice when you want multiple perspectives that won't converge on the same framing.
